title: Unveiling the Secrets: How Masking Strategies Shape Time Series Imputation

abstract: In this study, we explore the impact of different masking strategies on time series imputation models. We evaluate the effects of pre-masking versus in-mini-batch masking, normalization timing, and the choice between augmenting and overlaying …
